remarks:
Extend wff definition to include "Irreflexive" applied to a class, which is true iff class R is an irreflexive relationship over the set A. See ~ df-irreflexive .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 1-Dec-2019.) 

---

This syntax is primitive. The first axiom using it is #P_df-irreflexive|NAV_LINK|HIDE_TVI.
